item.description:
** Register by 5/28 **

Cox Business and Inc. are offering "Get Started Connecticut" during the CT Business Expo at the Connecticut Convention Center on Thursday June 6th from 9:30 - 10:45.

There wil be an opportunity to pitch your big idea, compete for a prize, and get feedback from people with expertise in starting and growing businesses.

Judges wil be Norm Bell - Editor, Hartford Business Journal; Leonora Valvo - CEO, eTouches; Josh Linkner - CEO, Detroit Venture Partners; Eric Markowitz - Senior Reporter, Inc.

BEFORE 5/28 - REGISTER AT: www.coxblue.com/getstarted/

Also, read the "fine print" for qualification.

No charge to enter.
item.name: Pitch Contest 6/6 - Chance to win $5,000 Cox Business Technology Package
